title: Restore always-visible Log out button on Manager/Operator profile pages

requirements.summary: Make the Manager and Operator profile pages always show a clearly visible Log out button that uses centralized logout logic and reliably returns users to /login on all screen sizes.
acceptanceCriteria: When navigating to /manager/profile (as a Manager/Admin), a clearly visible "Log out" button is present on the page without relying on the header dropdown.
When navigating to /operator/profile (as an authenticated Operator), a clearly visible "Log out" button is present on the page without relying on the header dropdown.
Clicking the profile page "Log out" button clears the credential session (and any admin token state), clears the React Query cache, and navigates to /login.
The "Log out" button remains visible and usable on both desktop and mobile layouts (no hidden/overflowed button in narrow widths).

file_operations.description: Adjust the profile header layout to be responsive (e.g., allow wrapping/stacking actions on narrow widths and/or make actions full-width on mobile) so the "Log out" button is always visible and not overflow-hidden. Ensure the button continues to call the centralized useAppLogout().logout (no duplicated logout logic).
